alert.note: Alert for Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 3:02AM MST until March 10 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches with higher amounts of 4 to 8 inches above 8000 ft in the San Francisco Peaks. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph in the evening. * WHERE...Areas near Doney Park, Flagstaff, and Williams. * WHEN...From 1 PM to 11 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Thursday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
